price: ߤߊ߲߫ ߸ ߣߌ߲߬ ߞߍߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߞߐ߲ߘߐ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊߏ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߞߏߢߌߡߊߟߐ߲ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā kāna lakum jazāan wakāna saʿyukum mashkūran
